page.title: 07 THE MALVERN FESTIVAL
page.content:
{The Malvern Festival,}is becoming one of the{largest}Festivals for a town of it's size,in Britian.The Festival brings many tourists to the town and is becoming better known.
The Festival was started in{1929}by{ {George Bernard Shaw.}In{1932 Elgar's} music was introduced.The War stopped the Festival in{1939,}a brief revival took place in{1949.}
{1977}saw a big boost with new management and the{Queen's Silver {Jubilee.
The{1985}Festival saw{Sir Micheal {Tippet}in residence to celebrate his{ {80th}birthday.The theme from{1986}will be{English Music}and{Playwrights.}This theme will be continued for the fore- seeable future.
